title: Restore version 17

requirements.text: Restore the application to the state it was in at version 17, reverting all changes made after that version across both frontend and backend.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed application matches the behavior and appearance of version 17.
All frontend and backend changes introduced after version 17 are reverted.
The app builds and deploys without errors.

constraints: Do not introduce any new features or changes beyond restoring version 17.
Immutable frontend paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be modified.
nonGoals: Applying any fixes or improvements from versions 18 through 27.
Introducing new functionality not present in version 17.
